channel.title: TSW Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "TSW Village" - I'm going to blow TSW in 2 weeks (ish) time! If you need SI come along and join the party! :-)

item.title: Re: TSW Village
item.content:encoded:
**I'm going to blow TSW in 2 weeks (ish) time! If you need SI come along and join the party **
:-)

item.title: Re: TSW Village
item.content:encoded:
So basically,you will be able to swap any drop for another?Interesting.

Do you have teh epic monument then?
TSW village right?Just so I'll know.

item.title: Re: Players needed for new village - TSW Village
item.content:encoded:
+30 players and now Burger Ninja, not to mention all the Kaiju :-)

Spare Kaiju drops are awared on a points basis, special VIP point for each drop donated to the village. 1 VIP point = 1 Kaiju drop

All activity is tracked and everything with the accounting is clear and transparent. Also reserve stock of rare items to help out villagers when they are in need.

We did have weekly prizes, but know Kaiju are here thats stopped. Any rare, non drop, items donated are given to the hardworking and needy :)

item.title: Re: Players needed for new village - TSW Village
item.content:encoded:
This we we bought the NRF upgrade, the Ninja cookery school (so Ramen on the Village page), and got an Enticement Altat.

So we are now having fun fighting lots of Kaiju.

Once we have lowerd our cost its Burger Ninja next, may be 5 days time as everyone is Kaiju fighting and not erning taxies :(

We have a fair points system for the extra drop. So if you really want something just work hard for the village (Spy, invade, Kaiju fight, etc) earn the points and you will get it. :)

item.title: Re: Players needed for new village - TSW Village
item.content:encoded: We have more players and more up grades, 35, access to the Monochome missions. And of course the weekly prizes of perm items, for the villager who does the most for the village that week. :)

item.title: Re: Players needed for new village - TSW Village
item.content:encoded:
To anyone who is interested, if you fancy getting 3-5 alts put in TSW. We will loan out for a week S2, S3, S4 players with Regalias and Claymore, depending on ninja. Also we will throw in some Rotating Time Spheres to sweeten the deal. And provide information from our extensive spying report so you can maximize the benifit. :)
This would be of greate use to you, if you are a new non NRF village!

Also I am open to other offers to get the other players I need. So if you have a problem, help me to solve mine and I will help you to solve yours :)

If your interested please contact me and we can work out the arrangements.

moc.liamelgoog|svb.wst#moc.liamelgoog|svb.wst

edit: Hey Guys, think we are coverd now! What a quick response, we had! Anyway if you anyone else is still interested, still contect me and we can arrange something for a couple of weeks time once the current aggreement has been concluded. :)

item.title: Re: Players needed for new village - TSW Village
item.content:encoded: We are now up to 30 upgrades and we still have a well stocked storehouse and weekly prizes for Villagers that have helped out. Also everyone gets stamina bonuses depending on ranking.

item.title: Re: Players needed for new village - TSW Village
item.content:encoded:
We are still recuiting, looking for new players that want to grow with us.
We will give you that helping hand you need to get on in the game :)

item.title: TSW Village
item.content:encoded:
Our Village has grown since I last edited this post, we're up to 25+ players now abd have entered NWW, have a Potion Place and you get 4 NNW fights.

Also, as an added bonus, there is now a weekly tradable perm item, no that cant be bought, as a Prize for the the Ninja who does most for the village that week.

We have so far 33 upgrade and will soon be going NRF.

All of us cooporate thats why we are growing so fast. You need an item and it not in the storehouse, someone find it for you :)

Alot of our players are season 2 or an Alt of a season 2 player, so there is a lot of knollege in the Village.
So if you want to be in a village where you get load of support and want to help it grow, this one is for you :)
About TSW -

Subwire was founded in 2006 and aims to bring together european language speaking fans of asian entertainment.
